attributes.action: Complete ban on all petitions regarding the EU referendum and independent london
attributes.background: This petition is being set up to stop all petitions being made and passed to goverment regarding the EU referendum and the independence of London. The people voted to leave and this should be final and not brought to parliament with a petition regardless of how many signatures it includes

rejection.details: We could accept a petition calling for the rules about the petitions accepted on petition.parliament.uk to be changed. However, the Government and Parliament aren't responsible for petitions on other sites.
